00045 bool TargetUId::IsValid()
00046 {
00047    if (fPolId == kUNKNOWN_POLID || fTargetOrient == kUNKNOWN_ORIENT || fTargetId == 0) return false;
00048    return true;
00049 }

00053 bool TargetUId::IsCompletelyUnknown()
00054 {
00055    if (fPolId == kUNKNOWN_POLID && fTargetOrient == kUNKNOWN_ORIENT && fTargetId == 0) return true;
00056    return false;
